plugins.name: confluence-docs
plugins.description: Search, read, create, and update Confluence pages. Use when working with company wiki, documentation, or knowledge base content.

plugins.name: code-review
plugins.description: Perform comprehensive code reviews following company standards. Use when reviewing pull requests, checking code quality, or ensuring best practices.

plugins.name: incident-response
plugins.description: Guide incident response workflow with runbooks, communication templates, and escalation procedures. Use during production incidents or outages.

plugins.name: technical-spec
plugins.description: Create technical specification documents following company template. Use when designing new features, systems, or architectural changes.

plugins.name: internal-comms
plugins.description: Write internal communications including status updates, announcements, and newsletters using company formats. Use for team updates, leadership comms, or company-wide announcements.

plugins.name: fastapi-scaffold
plugins.description: Scaffold new FastAPI projects with async SQLAlchemy, Pydantic v2, JWT auth, Docker, and Alembic migrations. Use when starting a new backend project or API service.

plugins.name: ai-agent-debugger
plugins.description: Debug and optimize multi-agent LLM workflows built with CrewAI, LangChain, and similar frameworks. Use when agents are looping, hallucinating, or producing wrong tool calls.

plugins.name: rag-pipeline
plugins.description: Build and optimize RAG pipelines with document chunking, embedding selection, vector DB setup, reranking, and evaluation. Use when building or improving retrieval-augmented generation systems.

plugins.name: prompt-engineering
plugins.description: Systematic prompt optimization framework with templates, patterns, A/B testing, and provider-specific tips. Use when writing, improving, or debugging LLM prompts.

plugins.name: python-test-generator
plugins.description: Generate comprehensive Python test suites with pytest, async support, LLM API mocking, and FastAPI fixtures. Use when writing tests or setting up test infrastructure.

plugins.name: docker-deploy
plugins.description: Docker and deployment workflows with multi-stage builds, docker-compose, Kubernetes manifests, and LLM scaling patterns. Use when containerizing apps or setting up deployments.

plugins.name: git-workflow
plugins.description: Git workflow automation with conventional commits, branch naming, PR templates, rebase guidance, and release tagging. Use when committing, branching, or managing releases.
